title: New Year’s Eve Punch(Silvesterabendpunsch)
ingredients: A 750 ml bottle of dry white wine
A 750 ml bottle of dry red wine
1 cup arrack (a brandy like rum) or dark Jamaican rum
instructions: In a kettle bring the 2 cups of water and the sugar to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.  Add the wines, lower the heat, and bring the mixture to a simmer.  After the mixture has reached a simmer add in the lemon juice and the arrack, stir to mix, and serve the punch in mugs
source: New Year’s in  Munich by Lillian Langseth-Christensen, Gourmet Magazine, January 1989.
